'''Fravashi Trees''' are an [[Exploration]] mechanic found in [[Girdle of the Sands]], [[Sumeru]].

Interacting with the Fravashi Tree with [[Sorush (Gadget)|Sorush]] will unlock a type of challenge. Types of challenges include:
* Locating the residual Pari fragments
* Flying alongside the Pari with Sorush
* Defeating enemies
* Giving [[Udumbara Pistil]]s to the Pari

==Trivia==
===Etymology===
* In Zoroastrianism, {{Lang|{{w|Fravashi|''fravashi''}}|ae=𐬟𐬭𐬀𐬎𐬎𐬀𐬴𐬌|ae_rm=fravaṣ̌i}} is the "higher soul" or "essence" of an individual &mdash; either living, dead, or yet unborn &mdash; that is incarnated in the material world to combat evil. The term typically refers to the beneficent spirits of dead ancestors, whose protection is invoked by means of ritual offerings.<ref>Encyclopedia.com: [https://www.encyclopedia.com/environment/encyclopedias-almanacs-transcripts-and-maps/fravashis Fravashis]</ref>
